mapper.sql: pi.id as pi_id, pi.server_id as pi_server_id, pi.pid as pi_pid, pi.name as pi_name, pi.port as pi_port, pi.detail as pi_detail, pi.root_path as pi_root_path, pi.startup_sh as pi_startup_sh, pi.shutdown_sh as pi_shutdown_sh, pi.status as pi_status, pi.deleted as pi_deleted, pi.version as pi_version
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from process_info pi
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into process_info
id,
server_id,
pid,
name,
port,
detail,
root_path,
startup_sh,
shutdown_sh,
status,
deleted,
version,

mapper.update:
update process_info pi
pi.id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pi.server_id = #{record.serverId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pi.pid = #{record.pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pi.name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pi.port = #{record.port,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pi.detail = #{record.detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pi.root_path = #{record.rootPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pi.startup_sh = #{record.startupSh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pi.shutdown_sh = #{record.shutdownSh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pi.status = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pi.deleted = #{record.deleted,jdbcType=BIT},
pi.version = #{record.version,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update process_info pi set pi.id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pi.server_id = #{record.serverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pi.pid = #{record.pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pi.name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pi.port = #{record.port,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pi.detail = #{record.detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pi.root_path = #{record.rootPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pi.startup_sh = #{record.startupSh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pi.shutdown_sh = #{record.shutdownSh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pi.status = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pi.deleted = #{record.deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, pi.version = #{record.version,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update process_info
server_id = #{serverId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
port = #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER},
detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
root_path = #{rootPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
startup_sh = #{startupSh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shutdown_sh = #{shutdownSh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update process_info set server_id = #{serverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, port = #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, root_path = #{rootPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startup_sh = #{startupSh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shutdown_sh = #{shutdownSh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
